dataset.title: Digitization of plant specimens from Rhoen and Vogelsberg (FLAD)

address.deliveryPoint: Senckenberg, Senckenberganlage 25, D-60325 Frankfurt am Main, Germany

abstract.para: The digitization from the possessions of the herbarium of the Rh√∂nmuseum Fladungen comprises metadata from specimen labels, georeferencing of localities and a digital image of the object.
